extendedInfo.description: Gift Card Balance helps you check the live balance of your gift cards (Australia Edition). Enter the gift card number and pin/ref, then the balance will be displayed. Previous cards are stored, you can re-check the card easily later on.The app is providing a simple and accurate way to help you track card balances. The balance query is done by connecting to the site of your card provider and retrieving the balance. The application does not collect any personal information from your phone. The stored card info is sent to your card provider only.Currently, these 85 gift cards are fully supported:-1st Choice Liquor-Accor Hotels-Adairs-Adrenalin-Alannah Hill-Angus and Robertson-Athletes Foot-Barbeques Galore-Bayfair Shopping Centre-Betta Electrical-BIGW-Borders-Botany Town Centre NZ-BWS-CALTEX-Cellarmasters-Clive Anthonys-Coles-Coles Express-Coles Group and Myer-Colorado Group-Dan Murphys-Darrell Lea-Dick Smith-Dotti-Dreamworld and White water-Dymocks-Event Cinemas-Event Cinemas Gold Class-Garden City-Harbourside-Hoyts Cinemas-IGA-IGA Christmas Club-Indooroopilly Shopping Centre-Jacqui-e-JayJays-JB HIFI-JB HIFI NZ-Jeanswest-Just Group-Karrinyup Centre-KFC Queensland-Kmart-Knox Shopping Centre-Liquorland-Lynn Mall NZ-Macquarie Centre-Mantra-Masters Home Improvement-Mitre 10-Mt Ommaney Centre-Myer-Myer MyReturns-Napoleon Perdis AU-Officeworks-Pacific Fair Centre-Park Beach Plaza-Payless Shoes-Peter Alexander-Portmans-Quiksilver and Roxy-Sanity-Smiggle-Subi.net.au-Sugarland Shopping Town-Sunglass Hut-Supercheap Auto-Target-The Good Guys-The Palms Shopping-Thomas Dux Grocer-Top Ryde City-Toysrus-Universal Visa-Village Road Show Theme Park-Vintage Cellars-Warringah Mall-Westfield-Westfield XS-WISH Gift Card-Woolworths-Woolworths Essentials-Woolworths Groceries Only-Woolworths LiquorThese 13 gift cards are under development due to lack of card info:-ABC Shop-Best Restaurants of Australia-Boating Camping Fishing-Chadstone-Keno-Medibank-Palace Cinemas-Rydges-Stockland-Tyre Plus-Village Cinemas-Village Cinemas Gold Class-Westpac Master Gift CardThese gift cards do not support online balance check, you need to ring the provider to find out balance:-AMF Bowling-Bras N Things -Country Road-David Jones-Flight Centre-Freedom-Highpoint-Home Timber and Hardware-Myer MyReward-Readings-Rebel Sport-Redballoon-Sportsgirl-Sussan-WittnerThese gift cards only support balance check in store:-Best and Less-Bunnings-Domayne-EB Games-Harvey NormanAndroid app permission requirements and explanations:[Internet] the app talks to your card provider to retrieve card balance in real time.[Storage Access] the gift card data is stored in your SD card so that you can easily query again.[Phone Call] Some card providers does not support online query, the app lets you call them directly.[Camera] You can submit your supported card by taking a photo and send to developer.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent for what it does.would be good though to have a refresh button on the card list screen to update balance on all cards at once
reviews.author: Douglas Lee

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing when adding a new card...cannot do anything. :(
reviews.author: Joss Terrell

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Very handy to check gift card balances. Though couple of bugs: pressing \'Read card No.\' consistently crashes the app, and whenever I create a new card or edit an existing card it opens Google Text to Speech.
reviews.author: Mike Bryan

reviews.title: Needs a mass update button
reviews.comment: Needs a mass update button but otherwise its really good

reviews.comment: Good way to keep track of card balances.

reviews.title: I used to love this app

reviews.title: Very handy

reviews.comment: ace 2 Movie Download and After the success of Race (2008), Ramesh Taurani registered Race 2 as a title and Abbas- Mustan said that they would go ahead with a sequel \"if we get a script in place which is even better than the original.\" The screenplay was written by Shiraz Ahmed who also wrote Race. Saif Ali Khan and Anil Kapoor were the first to sign on to the film in November 2009 and were reported to be the only returning cast members from the first film.
